The company will invest up to Rs 18,000 crore to bolster its EV lineup and charging infrastructure, aiming for one million charging points nationwide. This aggressive expansion follows their milestone of selling 250,000 electric cars.

Paul Rudd reacts to Travis Kelce’s emotional apology after Chiefs loss
description: Actor Paul Rudd shared his perspective on the Kansas City Chiefs' season. He highlighted the joy and memories the team has provided his family. Rudd embraced the team's elimination from playoff contention. He wished Patrick Mahomes a speedy recovery. Rudd also humorously suggested players deserved a break after a long season. He stated he was not too upset.

title: Sleep loss, stress, obesity emerging as key risks for breast cancer: ICMR study
description: A new ICMR study reveals disrupted sleep, rising stress, and central obesity are driving India's breast cancer surge, projected to add 50,000 cases annually. Lifestyle shifts, reproductive delays, and hormonal factors are reshaping disease patterns, differing from Western trends. Researchers emphasize prevention and early screening.

title: India closer to $450m BrahMos pacts with Vietnam, Indonesia
description: India is nearing deals to export BrahMos supersonic cruise missiles to Vietnam and Indonesia. Russia has given its nod for these sales. These agreements, worth over Rs 4,000 crore, will make Vietnam and Indonesia the latest ASEAN nations to acquire the missiles. India is also looking to export other defence systems to friendly countries.

title: Electoral might: BJP shows Rs 6,900cr bank balance, BSP an astounding 580cr; Cong Rs 53cr
description: Post-Delhi assembly election disclosures to the Election Commission show BJP holding over Rs 6,900 crore in bank balances, far ahead of rival parties. Congress has about Rs 53 crore, while the BSP holds Rs 580 crore despite limited presence. Congress had reported Rs 517 crore in large donations in 2024–25.

title: Assault over 'tu': Doctor suspended for hitting patient in Shimla hospital
description: A doctor at Shimla's IGMC was suspended after a video showed him brutally assaulting a patient who objected to being addressed disrespectfully. The patient alleged the doctor began punching him after he asked for politeness. An inquiry is underway, with authorities promising exemplary action against the involved medical staff.

title: Salesforce reboots AI strategy: Model errors raise concerns
description: Salesforce is scaling back its reliance on large language models due to reliability issues, shifting focus to more predictable automation. Executives admit a decline in AI model trust, citing instances where agents missed instructions or lost focus. This move follows significant staff reductions attributed to AI deployment, as the company navigates the gap between AI hype and practical business needs.

title: Who is Aaron Rodgers’ wife Brittani? Inside the Steelers QB’s marriage mystery
description: Steelers quarterback Aaron Rodgers has found unexpected peace in his marriage to Brittani.  Unlike his previous public relationships, Brittani values privacy.  Rodgers credits his wife with providing unconditional love and stability.  This new chapter sees a calmer, more focused Rodgers as he navigates his final NFL years.  His teammates and coaches notice the positive change.

title: Vanessa Bryant’s net worth: Exploring legacy and responsibility after Kobe's death
description: Vanessa Bryant now handles the vast financial legacy of her late husband and basketball legend, Kobe Bryant. Her net worth is estimated at $600 million as of 2025. She manages investments, endorsements, including Body Armor, and manages real estate. Vanessa also leads Granity Studios and Mamba Cita clothing and uses the money she earns from it to support young athletes. She continues brand partnerships and the Mamba & Mamba Cita Sports Foundation.
